Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.tool

Class EraserTool

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.tool.Tool
net.cnoga.paint.core.tool.EraserTool
All Implemented Interfaces:
WidthCapability
public class EraserTool extends Tool implements WidthCapability
A tool for erasing pixels from the canvas.

The EraserTool allows the user to erase by clicking or dragging across the canvas. The eraser size responds to WidthChangedEvent updates.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private double
    lastX
    The last known x position, so we can interpolate between end points for smooth erasing.
